flawed_nl_solution:
If in five years, Hania will be 45 years old, currently she is 45-5 = <<45-5=42>>42 years old.
Ten years ago, Hania was 42-10 = <<42-10=32>>32 years old.
Samir just turned half the age Hania was 10 years ago, which means she is 32/2 = <<32/2=16>>16 years old.
In five years, Samir will be 16+5 = <<16+5=21>>21 years old
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 42. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
